review.title: “Moderate career advancement, little benefits”
review.pros: Pros – Exposure to mobile device technology, high end customers
review.cons: Cons – No career advancement, uncertain direction of company and future
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to listen more to all level of employees, strengthen the HR team

review.title: “Good pay, but no life”
review.pros: Pros – The company, especially in manufacturing subsidiary, pay high bonus during good time.
review.cons: Cons – There is no life balance in the company. 50% of your job is out of the job description.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please change the company culture especially in grading the performance.

review.title: “Bad and stringy company”
review.pros: Pros – Can't find much about the pros
review.cons: Cons – Stringy. bad culture, bad people
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be more generous

review.title: “Listed Company, Family Feel”
review.pros: Pros – Easy access to top management and generally good positioning in market. Employee culture (staff to staff) is generally good and salaries are competitive.
review.cons: Cons – Complex politics centered on gaining the trust and ear of top management. Although Company is listed, it is run like a family run enterprise. Sales and Operations don't gel together. Constant change of management team means staff are disillusioned most of the time.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep top management and get a better lot of managers. Stop listening to only a few people. set up a real top class management team and let go of the reins.
